actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to modify the definition of the United States for the purposes of the prohibition against torture.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Torture Accountability Act - Amends the Federal criminal code to modify the definition of "United States" for purposes of the prohibition against torture as the States, the District of Columbia, and U.S.commonwealths, territories, and possessions (currently defined as all areas under U.S. jurisdiction).

titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to modify the definition of the United States for the purposes of the prohibition against torture.
